entities.name: ron
entities.description: One of the main characters in the story, a prefect and friend of Harry Potter.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A Slytherin student who is a prefect and member of the Inquisitorial Squad. He is known for being arrogant and mean-spirited.

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: A Slytherin student who is friends with Malfoy and Goyle.

entities.name: goyle
entities.description: A Slytherin student who is friends with Malfoy and Crabbe.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: One of the main characters in the story, a prefect and friend of Harry Potter. She is known for being smart and resourceful.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: A professor at Hogwarts who has been hand-picking members for the Inquisitorial Squad.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: The main character in the story, a prefect and friend of Ron Weasley and Hermione Granger. He is known for being brave and loyal.

entities.name: weasel king
entities.description: A title given to Malfoy by Crabbe and Goyle.

relationships.description: Malfoy is a member of the Inquisitorial Squad, which was hand-picked by Professor Umbridge.
Ron is a friend of Harry Potter.
